post.description: Verify the registration OTPs for email and mobile, then log in the user using JWT.

mobile_otp.description: OTP sent to the user's mobile

email_otp.description: OTP sent to the user's email

200.description: OTP verified successfully and user logged in

post.description: Resend the registration OTPs for email and mobile.

mobile_otp.description: OTP sent to the user's mobile

email_otp.description: OTP sent to the user's email

message.example: We have sent OTP your registered mobile number(******7890) & email(***@example.com). OTPs expire within 5 min.

post.description: Forgot Password send OTPs for email and mobile.

mobile_otp.description: OTP sent to the user's mobile

email_otp.description: OTP sent to the user's email

message.example: We have sent OTP your registered mobile number(******7890) & email(***@example.com). OTPs expire within 5 min.

post.description: Verify the OTP sent to the user's mobile and email for resetting the password.

requestBody.description: Pass mobile number, mobile OTP, and email OTP

error.example: Some error occurred. Please resend OTP.

post.description: Update the user's password using a temporary token.

requestBody.description: Pass temporary token and new password details

temp_token.description: Temporary token received for password reset

message.example: Your password successfully changed. Please login using new password.

400.description: Validation error or invalid temporary token

error.example: Validation error message or invalid temporary token.

post.summary: Send & Resend OTP for Login. Use Both (Send OTP & Resend OTP)
post.description: Sends & Resend OTP to the registered mobile number for login authentication.

requestBody.description: Provide mobile number for sending OTP.

post.description: Verifies the OTP sent to the user's mobile number for login.

requestBody.description: Provide mobile number and OTP for verification.

post.description: Logs in a user using their email and password and returns a JWT token.
Logs out the authenticated user and invalidates the JWT token.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all unique states from the pincodes database table.

post.summary: Retrieve unique districts based on state
post.description: Retrieves a list of unique districts for a given state from the pincodes database table.
Retrieves a list of pincodes for a given district from the pincodes database table.

get.summary: Retrieve all states with districts and pincodes
get.description: Retrieves a nested structure containing all states, each state with its districts, and each district with its corresponding pincodes from the pincodes database table.

Bearer.description: JWT authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
Bearer.name: Authorization
